column10: Drivers heading south on Shirlington Rd. do not yield to drivers coming around the loop (I was trying to get onto 395 South). Have almost been hit here at least once a month. People in the neighborhood refer to this as the ""death circle"" since it is so dangerous. Need to have a stop light or rumble strips for drivers going south on Shirlington Rd as then approach this intersection - they often ignore the stop/yield sign that is there.
column21: There is a yield sign that clearly says to yield to traffic in the circle but drivers fail to do so.
